SELECT ROWNUM "num", b.* FROM (SELECT distinct cu.user_id "userId", cu.login_name "loginName", cu.user_name "userName", cu.user_type "userType", cu.org_id "orgId", cu.sex "sex", cu.position "position", cu.employee_id "employeeId", (select d.org_name from tb_usc_hospital d where cu.org_id = d.org_id) "orgName", cu.office_id "officeId", (select b.org_name from tb_usc_org b where cu.office_id = b.org_id) "officeName", CASE cu.login_flag when 'Y' then '允许登录' when 'N' then '禁止登录' END "loginFlag", listagg(cr.role_name, ',') within GROUP(ORDER BY cu.user_id) over(partition by cu.user_id) as "roleName", cu.password "password", cu.phone_No "phoneNo", cu.mobile_No "mobileNo" FROM com_user cu, com_role_user ru, com_role cr WHERE cu.del_flag = 'N' and cu.user_id = ru.user_id(+) and ru.role_id = cr.role_id(+)
AND cu.user_id !='10000001'

AND cu.user_name like '%' || trim(#{param.userName}) || '%'
AND upper(cu.assist_code) like '%' || upper(trim(#{param.assistCode})) || '%'
AND cu.office_id like '%' || trim(#{param.officeId}) || '%'
AND cu.login_flag = 'Y'
AND cu.login_flag = 'N'
AND cu.user_type = trim(#{param.userType})
AND ru.role_id =trim(#{param.roleId})
) b
